thread.title: BRIEF-Intralot's unit signs a 10 year contract in Nigeria
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Intralot's unit signs a 10 year contract in Nigeria | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Intralot's unit signs a 10 year contract in Nigeria
text:
Oct 26 Intralot Integrated Lottery Systems And Services Sa :
* Says its Intralot Global Holdings unit signed a 10 year contract with Nigeria's ILGL to provide its lottery technology and knowhow
* Says the new lottery will begin operations before the end of 2015
Source text: bit.ly/1GssU4u
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
